amendment.description: To provide a substitute amendment to ensure violations of laws relating to circumvention are enforced.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3565 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3565 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S8401-8402; text: CR S8401-8402) To provide a substitute amendment to ensure violations of laws relating to circumvention are enforced.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3565 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator DeWine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3565 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
